condition_text: Pacientes con cncer de mama metastsico CMm o localmente recurrente LR HER2 negativo que no han recibido quimioterapia previa para el CMm o LC. Locally recurrent or metastatic breast cancer.
Advanced breast cancer metastatic or locally recurrent
HER2POSITIVE METASTATIC OR LOCALLY RECURRENT ADVANCED BREAST CANCER
Metastatic or Locally Advanced HER2-positive Breast Cancer
Unresectable/metastatic breast cancer with human epidermal growth factor receptor 2 HER2-positive expression
High-Risk, Node-Positive, HR+, HER2+ Breast Cancer

Early primary breast cancer, hormone receptor positve or negative, HER2 negative, any nodal status
